name: ModifyEventInformation
description:
Update details of a specific marketing event.

Use this tool to update the details of an existing marketing event by providing the object's ID. It confirms whether the update was successful.

parameters.name: event_internal_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the marketing event in HubSpot to be updated.

value_schema.description: The internal ID of the marketing event in HubSpot

parameters.name: event_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing various event details such as start and end date, custom properties, event name, organizer, and more to update the marketing event.

sourceId.description: The ID of the property source indicating where it was created.

selectedByUser.description: Whether the value was selected by a user.

source.description: The origin of the property value, such as "IMPORT" or "API".

updatedByUserId.description: The ID of the user who updated the property.

sourceMetadata.description: Source metadata encoded as a base64 string. For example: `ZXhhbXBsZSBzdHJpbmc=`

dataSensitivity.description: The sensitivity level of the property, such as "non_sensitive", "sensitive", and "highly_sensitive".

sourceVid.description: The unique identifier associated with the source.

unit.description: The unit of measurement or context for the value.

requestId.description: A unique ID associated with this request.

isEncrypted.description: Whether the property value is encrypted.

selectedByUserTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the value was selected by a user, if applicable.

timestamp.description: When the value was set, as a 64-bit integer.

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The internal ID of the marketing event in HubSpot

value_schema.description: The internal ID of the marketing event in HubSpot

sourceId.description: The ID of the property source indicating where it was created.

sourceVid.description: The unique identifier associated with the source.

requestId.description: A unique ID associated with this request.

isEncrypted.description: Whether the property value is encrypted.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
